faculty.name: Dr. B. Aditya Prakash
faculty.title: Associate Professor
faculty.description: How do you forecast pandemics? How you do distribute resources to stop an outbreak as fast as possible? How do failures in power grids cascade? I am broadly interested in Data Science, Machine Learning and AI with emphasis on solving big-data problems in networks and sequences.
